system.description:
Trigger: User's partner uses Z-Pose! and triggers the appropriate Z-Crystal
Effect: On hit, all valid targets have a 30% chance of gaining @Affliction[flinched] 3.
Requirement: [Dark] Z-Crystal as an Accessory Item and a Dark-Type attack on the user's Active List.

actions.name: Black Hole Eclipse

cost.trigger: User's partner uses Z-Pose! and triggers the appropriate Z-Crystal
